name: Ext_R5_ServiceRequest_location
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ServiceRequest.location for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ServiceRequest.location from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ServiceRequest|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The preferred location(s) where the procedure should actually happen in coded or free text form. E.g. at home or nursing day care center.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.location` maps to R4B `ServiceRequest.locationCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.location` maps to R4B `ServiceRequest.locationReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.location` maps to R4B `ServiceRequest.locationCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.location` maps to R4B `ServiceRequest.locationReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.location` maps to R4B `ServiceRequest.locationCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.location` maps to R4B `ServiceRequest.locationReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: A location type where services are delivered.
